channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Your last (second within a month) repair lasted less than 7 days. Re-surface the problem properly please!, 10th January
item.description:
Same area you've repaired twice in the past 5 weeks sadly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Corndean Lane, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress has been dumped on left hand side as you go towards Barnwood, 10th January
item.description:
On grass verge been there for weeks, if not months and is now going mouldy looks awful left hand side of road as you travel up towards sainsburys
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 10th January
item.description:
Customer reports that the barriers, for a broken manhole at the location, have been up and down for several years now - they've recently gone back up. The cover belongs to BT, who are clearly not bothered about it; the damage is minimal and they feel that it is not unsafe (it's just a crack). Please can the barriers be removed/the manhole be repaired asap, as the problem has existed for some time.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 10th January
item.description:
Blocked drain and flooding from area affecting surface and footway - see attached passed to Highway from TBC as GCC issue
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Timings for pedestrians at signal-controlled crossing excessively long, 10th January
item.description:
The wait times for pedestrians are in excess of two minutes. According to the Traffic Signs Manual 18.8.1, pedestrians should not have to wait more than 30 seconds after requesting to cross. Additionally, sometimes the red "button pressed" ring will be cancelled randomly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
